vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Gresham Smith to provide additional engineering services required for the design and development of construction plans and specifications for erosion and stream bank protection improvements at 8555 Fair Oaks Crossing - Not to exceed $60,165.00, from $635,394.30 to $695,559.30 - Financing: Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund
